messages.message:
FYI, Cypress CI is merge blocking now. If it failed on your PR, try deleting the sandbox and rerun the action. Ask your manager for force merge if you believe the failure is not related to your PR.

This CI test things end-to-end:
1. creating a sandbox
2. building services based on the code changes in the PR
3. seed DB
4. run Cypress tests in the sandbox
This is flaky in nature, because test coverage it high.

To delete your sandbox: go to https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes, search "pr-<pr number>" , and then delete it
Many times when I re-run the action it continues to fail
Are we prioritizing investigating this? I'm worried that the instability will slow down merges for a lot of teams

for me, it hasn't been super bad yet. Generally at max 2 retries I've had to do. It also fails within <1 min so i usually wait couple sec after opening a PR then retry - usually once it runs for a while it succeeds~ Still we should investigate why it fails but just a thing i noticed.

Definitely will keep on improving this. We can also disable merge-blocking if this becomes an issue.

Here are some stats: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1QMNujB2fqxp9P1KvEBRnoG1lV-JcjMaFnvvgdNePob0/edit?usp=sharing
Old Cypress CI average failure rate over the months ranges from 4% to 65%.
New Cypress CI average failure rate for August is around 35%.

The formula to calculate average failure rate is: `SUM (failure rate of make-sandbox + MAX (failure rate of Cypress 1,2,3))`

Still high, but it's better than before.
The new Cypress CI fails fast. The high failure rate comes from the make-sandbox step. If it fails, it usually fails within a couple of minutes. The average run time of the make-sandbox step is 10.64 minutes.
The old Cypress CI fails slow. The high failure rate comes from the actual Cypress test run. If it fails, it takes around an hour.

> Many times when I re-run the action it continues to fail
Did you delete the sandbox and re-run?
Usually I just click 're-run all jobs', is there another button specifically to delete sandbox?
Yea, need to go to crafting sandbox to delete. Just updated my original message
Got it okay, will keep that in mind for the future
